Templates.name: Modernity Addon 1.7.10
Templates.description: Download this first and place your downloaded Addons inside of it.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the regular Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Stained Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Stained Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Tinted Glass
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Tinted Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Sugarcane
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Sugarcane blocks so that they appear as frazzled at the top, regardless of their height.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Bookshelves
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Bookshelves so that they appear as one long shelf.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Randomized Bookshelves'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

(Keep in mind, that Brick Walls require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Bricks Complete Pack'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Planks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Planks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs, Fences and Fence Gates. Also includes small tweaks for Fences, Buttons and Pressure Plates. Also randomizes the textures of Crimson, Warped, Cherry and Mangrove Planks.

(Keep in mind, that Fences, Fence Gates, Buttons and Pressure Plates for the different wood types require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Desaturated Dark Oak Complete Pack'!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Curracabah Acacia Complete Pack'!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Vintage Cherry Complete Pack'!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Darker Mangrove Complete Pack'!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Red Crimson Complete Pack'!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Muted Warped Wood Complete Pack'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Grass and Fern [old]
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Tall Grass and Ferns so that they appear to be of random height. Also applies a mirrored texture to Dead Bushes.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Randomized Grass and Fern'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Bookshelves
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the side texture for Bookshelves so that they appear to be more random.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Connected Bookshelves'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Pumpkins
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the side texture for Pumpkins and Jack o'Lanterns.

#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by 'Pumpkin Complete Pack'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Mushrooms
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the textures for Red and Brown Mushrooms.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Flowers
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Dandelion, Poppy, Allium, Azure Bluet, Blue Orchid, Oxeye Daisy, Tulips, Cornflower, Lily of the Valley and Wither Rose.

(Keep in mind, that the Cornflower, Lily of the Valley and Wither Rose all require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Lilypads
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the textures for Lilypads to make them more random.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Cobblestone
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the texture of Cobblestone to appear more random. Also applies to Cobblestone Slabs, Stairs and Walls.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Stone Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Stone Bricks, Mossy Stone Bricks, Cracked Stone Bricks and Chiseled Stone Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls. Also makes Mossy Stone Brick take on a more saturated look when in certain biomes associated with wetness.

(Keep in mind, that Stone Brick Walls, Mossy Stone Brick Slabs, Mossy Stone Brick Stairs and Mossy Stone Brick Walls require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#FDCB58{This pack **overrides** 'Saturated Mossy Stone'!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Deepslate and Blackstone Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Deepslate Bricks, Cracked Deepslate Bricks, Blackstone Bricks and Cracked Blackstone Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

(Keep in mind, that Deepslate and Blackstone require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Mud Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Mud Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

(Keep in mind, that Mud Bricks require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Leaves
Randomized Blocks.description:
Gives Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia and Dark Oak Leaves colorful blots and randomizes them aswell to avoid tiling.

(Inspiration drawn from [Os' Colorful Leaves](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/os-colorful-leaves/).)

**⚠️ Warning: Due to technical limitations, it is not possible to correctly differentiate between *Fancy* and *Fast* Leaves. As a workaround, I will provide two fully functional texture packs instead of normal Addons. These packs are Labeled '[Fancy]' and '[Fast]' respectively. Just switch the packs as you see fit (or just use the one you want). This will be addressed when Right Proper MCPatcher supports dynamic texture picking for Leaves.**

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Vines
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the Vine textures utilizing the unused iterations from the Texture Update.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Grass and Fern
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Tall Grass and Ferns so that they appear more diverse. Also applies a new textures to Dead Bushes. Makes use of the new Bush textures from 1.21.5.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Randomized Grass and Fern [old]'!}

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Cows
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Cows. Cold biomes will have Wooly Cows in them. Now also includes the Cow textures from Minecraft Earth aswell as the Cold and Warm Cow textures from 1.21.5!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Chickens
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Chickens. Mushroom Islands will have Cluckshrooms on them. The End will have Midnight Chickens in them. Now also includes the Chicken textures from Minecraft Earth aswell as the Cold and Warm Chicken textures from 1.21.5!

Randomized Entities.name: Occasional Glowsquids
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Squids to include Glowsquids.

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Pigs
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Pigs. Swamplands will have muddy Pigs in them. Now also includes the Pig textures from Minecraft Earth aswell as the Cold and Warm Pig textures from 1.21.5!

Randomized Entities.name: Minecraft Earth Zombies
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Extreme Hills will have Bouldering Zombies in them. Everywhere else gets a mix of normal Zombies and Lobber Zombies.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Player Skin Zombies [1]'!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Player Skin Zombies [2]'!}

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Sheep
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Sheep. Cold biomes will have fuzzy Sheep in them, Taiga biomes will have inky Sheep in them and Extreme Hills will have rocky Sheep in them. Now also includes the Cow textures from Minecraft Earth!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Slimes
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Slimes. Beaches and Oceans will have tropically blue slimes. Now also includes the Slime textures from Minecraft Earth and Minecraft Dungeons!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Wolves
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Wolves. Now also includes the new Wolf textures from 1.20.80!

Randomized Entities.name: Classic-style Spider
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Spiders. Includes a brown Spider that looks similar to the Classic version. Also includes a version for the Cave Spider.

Randomized Entities.name: Alpha-style Zombie Pigman
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Zombie Pigmen. Includes a bloody Zombie Pigman that looks similar to the Alpha version.

Randomized Entities.name: Player Skin Zombies [1]
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Includes zombified versions of the new player skins that were added in 1.19.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Minecraft Earth Zombies'!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Player Skin Zombies [2]'!}

Randomized Entities.name: Player Skin Zombies [2]
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Includes even more raggedy zombified versions of the new player skins that were added in 1.19.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Minecraft Earth Zombies'!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with 'Player Skin Zombies [1]'!}

Templates.name: Modernity Addon 1.12.2
Templates.description: Download this first and place your downloaded Addons inside of it.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the regular Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Stained Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Stained Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Bookshelves
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Bookshelves so that they appear as one long shelf.

#DD2E44{This pack is **incompatible** with 'Randomized Bookshelves'!}

Main Texture Pack.name: Palettized Programmer Art
Main Texture Pack.description: Palettized Programmer Art texture pack, made by me. Its goal is to retain as much of the Programmer Art look as possible while also providing sane palettes to the textures so that texture artists can work with them more easily.
